translation.en: [girl 1] This is my last chance to be normal.
translation.it: È la mia chance per essere normale.

translation.en: The world don't know that yet.
translation.it: il mondo ancora non lo sa.

translation.en: [girl 2] I don't want to share you with the world.
translation.it: Non voglio dividerti con il mondo.

translation.en: Oh, y'all in here kissing again, huh?
translation.it: Siete di nuovo qui a baciarvi, eh?

translation.en: [girl 1] I told you to stop climbing through my window, 'cause if Mommy catch you, I'mma get a beating.
translation.it: Ti ho detto di non entrare dalla finestra, perché se mamma ti becca, me le dà.

translation.en: You're the only one she ain't gonna beat. Mommy slapped the shit out of me last week.
translation.it: - Non le darà a te. - Mi ha dato uno schiaffo.

translation.en: It's 'cause you told her to go to hell. You deserved it.
translation.it: Ci credo, l'hai mandata al diavolo.

translation.en: [girl 2] She tells your father to go to hell all the time.
translation.it: Lei manda sempre al diavolo vostro padre.

translation.en: She's grown. She can do that.
As long as we live in this house, we children.
translation.it: Finché viviamo qui, siamo i figli.

translation.en: And children must honor… [both] …thy mother and thy father.
translation.it: E i figli devono onorare il padre e la madre.

translation.en: It's in the Bible. You gotta do it.
If we did everything the Bible say, we'd live in a pretty messed-up world.
translation.it: Se seguissimo alla lettera la Bibbia, vivremmo in un bel casino.

translation.en: Why you always want what I got?
[girl 2] I don't know why, you don't do shit.
translation.it: Non so perché, non fai niente.

translation.en: She ain't never had a hard day's work in her life.
translation.it: Non ha lavorato un giorno in vita sua.

translation.en: Mommy makes me practice for six hours a day,
translation.it: Mamma mi fa esercitare per sei ore al giorno,

translation.en: and she yells at me the whole time.
translation.it: e mi urla contro tutto il tempo.

translation.en: Both of y'all can shut the fuck up.
Get your asses down here right now! Your father's home!
translation.it: Portate il culo qui! Vostro padre è a casa!

translation.en: -She ain't call my name. -[Abel] Don't worry. I'll protect you.
translation.it: - Non mi ha chiamato. - Tranquilla. Ti difendo.

translation.en: You always say that, and when she starts giving me the evil eye, you don't do shit.
translation.it: Lo dici sempre, e quando mi guarda storto non fai niente.

translation.en: Don't be messin' up my bag, boy.
What was y'all doing up there?
Go in there and say hello to your daddy.
Why you let him smoke that cigar in the house?
translation.it: Perché gli fai fumare il sigaro?

translation.en: Look, I don't care if you do it. Just don't bring it around your sister.
translation.it: Non m'importa se lo fai, ma non farlo davanti a tua sorella.

translation.en: [Father] You singing in church or something?
I was just trying to help.
Look at that. Do you like it? -It's beautiful. -Mmm.
Take it out. Let me put it on you. You just pull that.
translation.it: Prendila. Lascia che te la metta. Tirala fuori.

translation.en: in honor of God's love for you.
Turn around. Let me put this on you.
This will affirm your faith, keep you safe,
translation.it: Questa rafforzerà la tua fede. Ti proteggerà.

translation.en: [echoing] …that God loves you as His own.
translation.it: che Dio ti ama come una figlia.

translation.en: Always wear this. It'll protect you, keep you safe.
translation.it: Indossala sempre. Ti proteggerà, ti terrà al sicuro.

translation.en: Always wear this. Always… It'll protect you. [echoes overlapping]
translation.it: Indossala sempre. Ti proteggerà. Ti ricorderà…

translation.en: How come you didn't bring me nothing?
-[Beauty] I thought you liked-- -Get them bags upstairs, boy.
translation.it: - Pensavo ti piacesse… - Porta su i bagagli.

translation.en: [Abel] You lucky Beauty was here. I was about to drop your ass.
translation.it: Ringrazia Beauty. Ti avrei fatto il culo.

translation.en: Nigga, you wasn't about to do shit. Beauty just saved your life.
translation.it: Non avresti fatto un cazzo. Beauty ti ha salvato la vita.

translation.en: I'm sick of his ass always trying to punk me. He just mad 'cause he ain't cute like y'all.
translation.it: - Mi ha rotto le palle. - Gli girano perché non è bello come voi.

translation.en: Ain't my fault he got a ugly daddy.
translation.it: Che c'entro, se il padre è brutto?

translation.en: [Mother] Do not say that about your brother.
translation.it: Non parlare così di tuo fratello.

translation.en: You're never going to convince me that in order to live, I gotta eat something dead.
translation.it: Non riuscirai mai a convincermi di questa cosa.

translation.en: You ain't gonna convince me. It's not gonna happen.
translation.it: Non mi convincerai. Non succederà mai.

translation.en: [inhales] I heard you shut the place down last night.
translation.it: So che ieri sera hai fatto faville.

translation.en: Wanted to see if you got what it takes.
translation.it: Volevo vedere se avevi la stoffa.

translation.en: I guess I do. I could've told you that.
translation.it: - Pare di sì. - Io lo sapevo.

translation.en: Still can't hold a candle to me, though.
translation.it: Non è ancora al mio livello.

translation.en: Nobody can hold a candle to you.
If the student is not as good as the teacher,
translation.it: Se l'allieva non è brava come l'insegnante,

translation.en: then the teacher's not doing a good job.
translation.it: l'insegnante non fa un buon lavoro.

translation.en: [Father] Well, you have done a wonderful job teaching her, honey.
translation.it: Stai facendo un ottimo lavoro, tesoro.

translation.en: She still got some work to do.
I think she ready for the big time.
Don't speak at my table unless I ask you a question.
translation.it: Non parlare alla mia tavola se non ti interpello.

translation.en: -I don't need permission to speak. -When you're in my house, you do.
translation.it: - Non mi serve il permesso. - A casa mia, sì.

translation.en: -Then I'll leave. -Yeah! Get the fuck out!
translation.it: - Allora vado via. - Sì! Vattene! Beauty, lasciala andare.

translation.en: Beauty, let her go. Don't need this devil worshipper in my home.
translation.it: Vattene! Beauty, lasciala andare. Adoratrice del diavolo.

translation.en: -I don't worship no devil. -You don't worship God.
translation.it: - Non adoro il diavolo. - Non adori Dio.

translation.en: Can we all just calm down?
[Father] We are having a family discussion,
translation.it: È una discussione in famiglia e se non sbaglio

translation.en: and last time I checked, you aren't part of this family.
translation.it: È una discussione in famiglia e se non sbaglio tu non ne fai parte.

translation.en: -Maybe one day I will be. -[Father] What you gonna do?
translation.it: - Forse un giorno sì. - Cosa farai?

translation.en: I wouldn't touch that thing with a ten-foot pole.
translation.it: Non la toccherei nemmeno con un palo.

translation.en: Let's run away and get married and never come back.
translation.it: Scappiamo, sposiamoci e non torniamo più.

translation.en: You think marriage is a joke? Huh?
translation.it: Pensi che il matrimonio sia uno scherzo?

translation.en: "For this reason, a man leaves his mother and father
translation.it: "Per questo motivo, l'uomo abbandonerà suo padre e sua madre

translation.en: and unites with his wife to become one." Not two but one flesh.
translation.it: e si unirà a sua moglie e così i due saranno una sola carne.
Dunque, quello che Dio ha congiunto,

translation.en: That you're one flesh with your wife?
translation.it: Sei così unito con tua moglie?

translation.en: That you only have eyes for her?
Cain, would you take my plate, please, son?
translation.it: Cain, prendi il mio piatto, per favore?

translation.en: [woman] Oh, well, your husband asked me to come by around six.
translation.it: Beh, tuo marito mi ha chiesto di venire verso le sei.

translation.en: -Why you leave her on the doorstep? -I don't want her up in my damn house.
translation.it: - L'hai lasciata fuori? - Non la voglio in casa.

translation.en: [Mother] I don't need to hear her out to know she full of shit.
translation.it: Non voglio ascoltare le sue stronzate.

translation.en: Then I'mma talk to her myself.
You can't make a decision like that without me!
translation.it: Non puoi decidere senza di me!

translation.en: I'mma ask the woman in if that's all right with you.
translation.it: La invito a entrare, se per te va bene.

translation.en: and… beauty of Lena, soul of Billie, the--
translation.it: la bellezza di Lena, l'anima di Billie, la…

translation.en: Yes, she does. You taught her well.
The torch has to be passed to someone,
translation.it: Il testimone va passato a qualcuno,

translation.en: and I believe that someone is your daughter.
translation.it: e credo che quel qualcuno sia tua figlia.

translation.en: That's the same thing she said to me ten years ago.
translation.it: L'ha detto anche a me dieci anni fa.

translation.en: And I was telling the truth.
It's just that I think you were ahead of your time.
translation.it: È solo che penso che per te fosse presto.

translation.en: No. Beauty is right on schedule.
translation.it: No. Per Beauty è il momento giusto.

translation.en: A blind man could tell you she's going places.
translation.it: Anche un cieco capirebbe che può fare strada.

translation.en: It takes somebody who knows what to do…
translation.it: Ci vuole qualcuno che sappia cosa fare.

translation.en: I can shape that to make something out of that…
translation.it: Io posso plasmarla e ricavarne qualcosa.

translation.en: I can bring people to the table…
…so that everyone in America is gonna want a piece of her.
translation.it: e fare in modo che tutta l'America la voglia.

translation.en: And she can make you a whole lot of money, can't she?
translation.it: E che ti faccia guadagnare un sacco di soldi, no?

translation.en: [woman] We can agree to work together on this.
I can promise you you're never gonna have to work again for the rest of your life.
translation.it: Vi prometto che non dovrete più lavorare in vita vostra.

translation.en: [Mother] And if everybody gets a piece,

translation.it: - Si tratta di Beauty. - Lo so.

translation.en: And I want what's best for her.
You want what's best for your bank account.
translation.it: Vuoi il meglio per il conto in banca.

translation.en: Don't make me smack you in front of this white woman.
translation.it: Non costringermi a colpirti davanti a questa bianca.

translation.en: Should I step out? Give you two a minute?
translation.it: Volete che esca e vi dia qualche minuto?

translation.en: to make you know that I have Beauty's best interests at heart?
translation.it: per farvi capire che ho a cuore gli interessi di Beauty?

translation.en: You can wait. A few more years.
You don't know what's out there.
translation.it: Tu non sai cosa c'è là fuori.

translation.en: The… the record industry is the devil,
and he's just waiting to swallow you up.
translation.it: e non aspetta altro che inghiottirti.

translation.en: [Mother] Do you know what they do to stars, huh?
They build you up just so they can tear you down.
translation.it: Le portano in alto per poterle distruggere.

translation.en: Can't nobody tear me down, Mommy.
You taught me to keep my head high
translation.it: Mi hai insegnato a essere fiera
e mettere Dio al primo posto.

translation.en: Go to your room or be dragged.
translation.it: Vai in camera tua o ti ci porto io.

translation.en: I am not sending her out in the world to be eaten by wolves.
translation.it: Non la manderò la fuori in pasto ai lupi.

translation.en: [Father] How you know that she not a wolf?
translation.it: Come fai a sapere che lei non è un lupo?

translation.en: 'Cause she came out of my body.
translation.it: Perché è uscita dal mio corpo.

translation.en: Can you hand me that rag over there?
What you doing up so early?
For sure, you got a lot on your mind.
Hey, get in the car. Try to turn it on.
[Father] You in the driver seat now.
Move over. I'll take it from here.
You really think I'm gon' make it?
translation.it: Credi davvero che ce la farò?

translation.en: I think that you're gonna give people hope.
translation.it: Credo che darai speranza alla gente.

translation.en: God, I can't help but look at you and still see my little girl. [inhales]
translation.it: Quando ti guardo, vedo ancora la mia bambina.

translation.en: I just wish I could hold on to you a little bit longer.
translation.it: Vorrei poterti tenere ancora con me.

translation.en: When you sign that contract, everything's gonna change.
translation.it: Quando firmerai quel contratto, cambierà tutto.

translation.en: probably be the hardest thing I ever have to do.
translation.it: sarà la cosa più difficile che farò mai.

translation.en: It's not easy for a father… [inhales] …to send his little girl out into the world.
translation.it: Non è facile per un padre mandare la sua bambina nel mondo.

translation.en: Jasmine and I were talking-- She's not your family.
translation.it: - Io e Jasmine dicevamo… - Non è la tua famiglia.

translation.en: you're gonna regret it the rest of your life.
translation.it: te ne pentirai per il resto della vita.

translation.en: Well, sometimes greatness skips a generation.
translation.it: A volte la grandezza salta una generazione.

translation.en: Why you let him do that?

translation.it: Mio padre mi ha dato la vita.

translation.en: How about this? You live your life, and I'll live mine.
translation.it: Senti, tu vivi la tua vita e io la mia.

translation.en: You really think you can trust him? Of course I can.
translation.it: - Credi di poterti fidare di lui? - Certo che sì.

translation.en: [Jasmine] Just 'cause he's your father doesn't mean he's trustworthy.
translation.it: Questo non significa che puoi fidarti.

translation.en: You gonna sign the contract or not?
Your life's gonna get real big real fast.
translation.it: Molto presto avrai una vita intensa.

translation.en: It's gonna be like a freight train you can't stop.
translation.it: Sarà come un treno che non puoi fermare.

translation.en: Yeah, but you'll be on that train with me.
translation.it: Sì, ma tu sarai su quel treno con me.

translation.en: What if I want my own train?
translation.it: E se volessi il mio treno?

translation.en: My train will be a lot nicer.
translation.it: Il mio treno sarà più bello.

translation.en: -I don't got no money. -[bartender] It's on the house.
How come you never give me no free shit? [bartender] She prettier than you.
translation.it: - Perché a me non offri mai niente? - Lei è più carina.

translation.en: Is that your way of giving God praise?
translation.it: È questo il tuo modo di lodare Dio?

translation.en: You are not singing from your gut.
translation.it: Non stai cantando con la pancia.

translation.en: -I'm trying. -Y… y'all hear me do it every Sunday.
translation.it: Ci sto provando. Mi senti farlo ogni domenica.

translation.en: No, you won't, 'cause I done had enough.
translation.it: No, perché ne ho avuto abbastanza.

translation.en: [Mother] You are way too pretty and way too talented
translation.it: Sei troppo bella e hai troppo talento

translation.en: to walk out on a national stage and not be noticed.
translation.it: per salire su un palco nazionale senza essere notata.

translation.en: [Beauty] I just wanna use the gift God gave me.
translation.it: Voglio solo usare il dono di Dio.

translation.en: [Beauty] People can fantasize about me all they want.
translation.it: La gente può fantasticare quanto vuole.

translation.en: [Mother] It's way too much to live up to.
I have sung behind people my whole life.
translation.it: Ho fatto la corista per altri per tutta la vita.

translation.en: Never had the spotlight on my face.
translation.it: I riflettori non erano mai su di me.

translation.en: But I've been close enough to see 'em get burned by it.
translation.it: Ma ero abbastanza vicina da vederli finire bruciati.

translation.en: It ain't all it's cracked up to be.
It's not about you being careful.
translation.it: Non si tratta di stare attenti.

translation.en: It's about you having to be something you not.
translation.it: Si tratta di dover essere qualcosa che non sei.

translation.en: [scoffs] You can't spend the rest of your life trying to be something else.
translation.it: Non puoi passare la vita a cercare di essere qualcun'altra.

translation.en: You will end up forgetting who you really are.
translation.it: Finirai per dimenticare chi sei veramente.

translation.en: You think I don't know who you are?
translation.it: Credi che non sappia chi sei?

translation.en: Folk gon' wanna know who you laying with, Beauty.
translation.it: La gente vorrà sapere con chi vai a letto, Beauty.

translation.en: -And that's none of their business. -And that ain't how none of this work.
translation.it: - Non sono affari suoi. - Non è così che funziona.

translation.en: Just 'cause it didn't work out for you doesn't mean it won't work out for me.
translation.it: Se tu non ce l'hai fatta, non deve valere anche per me.

translation.en: You are sheltered, and you're spoiled.
We have spent our whole lives trying to protect you.
translation.it: Abbiamo passato tutta la vita a cercare di proteggerti.

translation.en: When you walk out on that stage, we can't come with you.
translation.it: Quando salirai su quel palco, non potremo venire con te.

translation.en: So who gonna do it, then?
The world ain't ready for that.
-I don't sleep in a bed with my friends. -That's because God's your only friend.
translation.it: - Io non dormo con gli amici. - Dio è il tuo unico amico.

translation.en: Life, life is about balance, Beauty.
translation.it: La vita è questione di equilibrio, Beauty.

translation.en: For every good thing you get,
translation.it: Per ogni cosa buona che ottieni,

translation.en: something bad… something bad is gonna happen.
It's okay if I'm not with you on that train.
translation.it: Posso anche non salire sul treno.

translation.en: Can't always get everything you want.
translation.it: Non si può avere sempre tutto.

translation.en: 'Cause that's not how the world works.
translation.it: Perché il mondo non funziona così.

translation.en: You don't think I should sign that contract, do you?
translation.it: Pensi che non dovrei firmare, vero?

translation.en: I don't think your father's the only one that should be looking at it.
translation.it: Non dovrebbe occuparsene solo tuo padre.

translation.en: -Find a lawyer. -I don't know how to do that.
translation.it: - Trova un avvocato. - Non so come fare.

translation.en: I'll always be here to protect you.
I woke up this morning. I had no doubts.
translation.it: Oggi mi sono svegliato senza dubbi.

translation.en: How many of y'all had doubts?
Well, we gonna clear that up right now.
All right now. How you doing, sister?
[pastor] Give it up for this beautiful choir, y'all!
translation.it: Un applauso per questo bel coro!

translation.en: Stand up if you love Him. Stand up if you love Him!
translation.it: Alzatevi, se lo amate. Alzatevi, se lo amate!

translation.en: [pastor] All right, y'all. I have no doubts.
[pastor] Hey, help me remember ya right here.
Shout for Jesus. Raise your hands for Jesus.
translation.it: Gridate per Gesù. Alzate le mani per Gesù.

translation.en: I see some smiles in here.
You got the pearls on today.
[Mother] We're all excited until the bottom drops out, right?
translation.it: Tutti eccitati finché non va male, vero?

translation.en: We all waiting here. She's gonna just take that pen
translation.it: - Sì. - L'ha detto lei. Prenderà la penna e firmerà a pagina tre.
Prenderà la penna e firmerà a pagina tre.

translation.en: I want my lawyer to look at it.
Your dad and I have looked that contract over a million times.
translation.it: Io e tuo padre abbiamo letto quel contratto un milione di volte.

translation.en: Now my lawyer could go over it again.
What you need with a lawyer?
Jasmine thought I should get one.
What you doing? Come over here. Get up. Come on, now. Right now!
translation.it: Che stai facendo? Vieni qui. Alzati. Andiamo. Subito!

translation.en: What the hell you think you're doing?
I'm just looking out for myself.
That's what this is about for you.
translation.it: È di questo che si tratta.

translation.en: And I wanna make sure I have a say in it.
-You know she has a name. -I don't give a shit what her name is.
translation.it: - Sai che ha un nome. - Me ne frego di come si chiama.

translation.en: I am your father, and you're not gonna disrespect me.
translation.it: Sono tuo padre e non mi mancherai di rispetto.

translation.en: I'm not trying to disrespect you.
I wanna make sure I'm doing the right thing.
If you don't sign that contract now,
translation.it: Se non firmi quel contratto ora,

translation.en: I'mma put your shit on the front lawn, and you can fend for yourself.
translation.it: ti butto fuori di casa e dovrai arrangiarti.

translation.en: After all I done for you, this is how you repay me?
translation.it: Dopo tutto quello che ho fatto per te, mi ripaghi così?

translation.en: I never thought I'd see the day
when my own daughter thinks I'm trying to steal from her.
translation.it: che mia figlia potesse temere che volessi derubarla.

translation.en: Well, you better figure it out, honey.
You better make a decision fast
translation.it: Farai meglio a decidere in fretta,

translation.en: because we worked too hard to get here for you to throw it all away.
translation.it: perché ci siamo impegnati troppo per farti mandare tutto all'aria.

translation.en: Okay, gonna be a big star.
-[woman] We did it. -[Father] I think we did it together.
translation.it: Ce l'hai fatta. Ce l'abbiamo fatta.

translation.en: And I'm gonna be there for you every step of the way.
translation.it: Io ci sarò per te in ogni momento.

translation.en: Are you really happy for me, Mommy?
translation.it: Sei davvero felice per me, mamma?

translation.en: Why your face lookin' so long?
What you mean you can't find her?
translation.it: In che senso non la trovi?

translation.en: I called her house three times, and no one answered.
translation.it: L'ho chiamata e non ha risposto nessuno.

translation.en: And then I went over there, and her mom said she wasn't home.
translation.it: Sono andata lì e la madre ha detto che non c'era.

translation.en: Okay, well, I'm sure she's fine. She'll turn up.
translation.it: Sono sicura che sta bene. Si farà viva.

translation.en: Why don't you come downstairs with us and have a drink?
translation.it: Perché non vieni giù a bere qualcosa?

translation.en: Your brothers is already down there drunk.
translation.it: I tuoi fratelli sono già ubriachi.

translation.en: what kind of man you are.

translation.it: - Davvero? - Sì. Non è un cazzo.

translation.en: I could tell you what kind of man Abe won't be.
translation.it: Posso dirti che tipo di uomo Abe non sarà mai.

translation.en: [Father] Yeah, he living the life right now.
'Cause he got my good looks and his mother's charm.
translation.it: Perché ha il mio bell'aspetto e il fascino di sua madre.
Perché gli è stato dato tutto.

translation.en: That's why he always walk around with that stupid look on his face.
translation.it: Ecco perché va sempre in giro con quell'espressione da idiota.
Farà meglio a godersi il momento,

translation.en: now 'cause as he gets older, his looks will fade,
translation.it: adesso, perché invecchiando, il bell'aspetto svanirà,

translation.en: as will his ability to talk women out their panties.
translation.it: così come il suo fascino per le donne.

translation.en: And he would be sad and miserable.
translation.it: E lui sarà triste e infelice.

translation.en: and his children will only love him
translation.it: e i suoi figli gli vorranno bene

translation.en: will feel compelled to keep his memory alive.
translation.it: avranno voglia di tenere viva la sua memoria.

translation.en: 'Cause I wasn't there when you conceived.
translation.it: Non c'ero quando sei stato concepito.

translation.en: -But you was there when I was born. -Yeah. Not the same.
translation.it: - C'eri quando sono nato. - Non è lo stesso.

translation.en: I'm still trying to figure you out.
[Cain] Well, what you need to know?
if you'd do something for me.
I'd do anything for you, Pop.
translation.it: Farei qualsiasi cosa per te, papà.

translation.en: [Cain] What you need me to do?
The fuck you mean "make her go away"?
Show me what kind of man you are.
[Cain] Me and Abe just 'bout to go for a ride.
translation.it: Io e Abe facciamo un giro.

translation.en: Get your ass in the fucking car.
-I'll tell you when we get there. -Fuck that. Tell me now.
translation.it: - Lo saprai quando arriviamo. - Dimmelo ora.

translation.en: -Just relax. -Nigga, don't tell me to relax.
I ain't got nothing against Jasmine.
translation.it: Io non ho niente contro Jasmine.

translation.en: If Beauty want a lady friend, that's her business. It ain't got nothing to do with us.
translation.it: Se Beauty vuole un'amica, sono affari suoi. Noi non c'entriamo.

translation.en: -It's got everything to do with us. -It's her life.
translation.it: - C'entriamo eccome. - È la sua vita.

translation.en: We can't have evil people hanging around our sister.
translation.it: Nostra sorella non può stare con gente malvagia.

translation.en: You need to man the fuck up!
-Get your ass out! -You really wanna fuckin' fight me?
translation.it: - Scendi! - Vuoi fare a botte con me?

translation.en: Come out before I drag your ass out.
translation.it: Esci o ti tiro fuori io.

translation.en: What? Try and hit me again!
Come here! You run like a girl, motherfucker!
translation.it: Vieni! Corri come una femmina, stronzo!

translation.en: I don't think I've seen you in here without her.
translation.it: Non ti ho mai visto qui senza di lei.

translation.en: Yeah, well, I… I can be alone sometimes.
translation.it: Sì, beh, a volte posso stare da sola.

translation.en: You know, I got some shit if you want it.
translation.it: Beh, ho un po' di roba, se vuoi.

translation.en: Yeah, that's not really my thing. It's Beauty's.
translation.it: Non è il mio genere. È quello di Beauty.

translation.en: Well, maybe you could gift it to her.
[Jasmine] Come on, my dude. That ain't no gift.
It would be if you gave it to her.
translation.it: Lo sarebbe, se glielo dessi tu.

translation.en: -[Jasmine] Meet you where? -Out back. Come on.
[bartender] Yeah… Right over here. I got you.
I told you I got you. Come on.
You ain't got nothing to say to me, boy?
You, who are just like me?
You couldn't do that shit, boy.
translation.it: Non sei in grado di farlo.

translation.en: Just like everything else I ask you to do.
translation.it: Come tutto quello che ti chiedo.

translation.en: [Beauty] We just gotta get out of here.
You live your life, I'll live mine.
translation.it: Tu vivi la tua vita, io vivo la mia.

translation.en: Why didn't you say it back?
translation.it: Perché non me lo dici anche tu?

translation.en: [Beauty] We finally have a place of our own.
to the criticism you've been getting from your Black audience?
translation.it: alle critiche che ricevi dal tuo pubblico nero?

translation.en: Well, some people say that you're pandering to a white audience
translation.it: Beh, alcuni dicono che vuoi assecondare il pubblico bianco

translation.en: and that you don't want your music to sound too
translation.it: e che non vuoi che la tua musica suoni troppo…

translation.en: -[woman whispers] Stay in character. -No, I'm asking you a question.
translation.it: - Resta nel personaggio. - No, è una domanda.

translation.en: No, we… we are gonna first appeal to the urban audience.
translation.it: No, prima punteremo al pubblico urbano.

translation.en: [woman] Well, we're gonna choose a song
that Black women are going to love.
Also, that white teenage girls are gonna go crazy over
translation.it: ma che anche le adolescenti bianche possano apprezzare

translation.en: and play over and over and over again.
That way, you'll get both sides of the market.
translation.it: Così avrai entrambe le fette di mercato.

translation.en: Now, I'd like you to answer the question that I ask you,
translation.it: Ora vorrei che rispondessi alla domanda che ti ho fatto

translation.en: and I'd like you to do it in proper English.
translation.it: e vorrei che lo facessi in inglese corretto.

translation.en: I… I don't know how to sing in Black, white…
translation.it: Io non so cantare da nera o da bianca.

translation.en: I just know how to sing, because that's what I like to do.
translation.it: So solo cantare, perché è ciò che mi piace fare.

translation.en: You have a lot of love songs on your album.
translation.it: Nel tuo album ci sono un sacco di canzoni d'amore.

translation.en: who are you singing them to?
Let's just go with the answer we prepared.
Why do I have to do this?
Because you cannot just be a singing star.
translation.it: Perché non puoi essere solo una cantante.

translation.en: You, Beauty, have to be the whole package.
translation.it: Tu, Beauty, devi essere il pacchetto completo.

translation.en: There are a lot of little… little girls
who need someone to look up to.
translation.it: che hanno bisogno di qualcuno da ammirare.

translation.en: If you wanna be a star…
you're gonna have to wear a mask.
Let's answer the question as it was prepared.
translation.it: Rispondiamo alla domanda come ci siamo preparate.

translation.en: I haven't found that special someone yet.
translation.it: Non ho ancora trovato la persona giusta.

translation.en: But when I'm singing those love songs,
translation.it: Ma quando canto le canzoni d'amore,

translation.en: I'm thinking about what he could be.
translation.it: penso a come lui potrebbe essere.

translation.en: Um, please don't say that in public.
Just wait for when we're at the house, okay?
translation.it: Aspetta che arriviamo a casa, ok?

translation.en: This is all still a lot for us to get used to.
translation.it: Dobbiamo ancora abituarci a tutto questo.

translation.en: I don't care what you do at home.
translation.it: Non m'importa cosa fate a casa.

translation.en: Just when we're out and about, we have a certain image to maintain.
translation.it: Ma quando siamo in giro, dobbiamo mantenere una certa immagine.

translation.en: I just want what's best for you.
translation.it: Voglio solo il meglio per te.

translation.en: I know what's best for me.
translation.it: So cosa è meglio per me.

translation.en: Why don't you try on one of the long, black, flowing ones?
translation.it: Perché non provi una di quelle lunghe e fluenti?

translation.en: Why can't I just rock my own hair?
translation.it: Perché i miei capelli non vanno bene?

translation.en: that little Black girls like long, flowing hair.
translation.it: alle ragazzine nere piacciono i capelli lunghi e fluenti.

translation.en: Maybe that's because people like you
translation.it: Forse perché le persone come te

translation.en: always tell them that's the only way they can be beautiful.
translation.it: dicono che è l'unico modo di essere belle.

translation.en: You sure you don't wanna try a long one?
No. Actually, I like the short, curly one.
translation.it: No. In realtà, mi piacciono corti e ricci.

translation.en: [Jasmine] Yeah, I like that one too.
[woman] Max, slap that one on there, and let's take a look at it first.
translation.it: Max, perché non gliela metti e diamo un'occhiata?

translation.en: Ooh, ah, ah, ah, let's go.
Turn and dip and move that hip. Okay!
translation.it: Giro e muovo il fianco, ok.

translation.en: One more time. Let's go. And…
I never met a Black person who couldn't dance before.
translation.it: Non avevo mai incontrato una nera che non sa ballare.

translation.en: She ain't every pop star. Just keep the steps simple.
translation.it: Lei non è le altre. Falle fare passi semplici.

translation.en: She can join up for some of those, and then the complicated stuff,
translation.it: Può fare quelli, mentre durante le parti complicate,

translation.en: she can be out front doing one of her long runs.
translation.it: può stare davanti a cantare e basta.
Ci sto, se va bene a lei.

translation.en: Trust me, she hates this shit.

translation.it: È come un cavallo da corsa.

translation.en: [man] I'm sorry. It's just an expression.
translation.it: Scusa. È solo un modo di dire.

translation.en: I don't give a fuck what it is. Don't be calling my girl no horse.
Do we have the words to give you? Can we do that on the stand?
[woman] So you're not looking at it, but is there a way…
translation.it: Quindi non lo stai guardando, ma puoi…

translation.en: I need some amazing vocalists behind her.
Who do you have in mind?
[neighbor] Hey, um, can you turn it down, please?
I've been living here two whole years. Been quiet as shit.
translation.it: Ho vissuto qui per due anni. Era tranquillissimo.

translation.en: Teenagers move in, and I haven't had a peaceful night since.
translation.it: Poi sono arrivati gli adolescenti e non ho più dormito.

translation.en: You motherfuckers always playing music loud, giggling and shit.
translation.it: Voi stronzi tenete la musica alta, ridete, eccetera.

translation.en: Well, you sure do look like one.
That's because you haven't seen me with my clothes off.
translation.it: Perché non mi hai mai visto senza vestiti.

translation.en: Listen, just, uh… just try to keep it down, okay?
translation.it: Senti, cerca di tenere il volume basso, ok?

translation.en: You were talking to him a long time.
translation.it: Ci hai parlato un bel po'.

translation.en: Relax, he just wanted me to turn the music down.
translation.it: Rilassati, voleva solo che abbassassi la musica.

translation.en: I'm surprised you didn't cuss his ass out.
translation.it: Mi sorprende che non l'abbia insultato.

translation.en: I wasn't in the mood to cuss his ass out.
You always in the mood to cuss somebody out.
[woman] So you ready for your big debut?
translation.it: Pronta per il tuo grande debutto?

translation.en: [woman] Irv wants you to come on his show and sing.
translation.it: Irv vuole che canti al suo show.

translation.en: So you're going on his show, and you're gonna sing.
translation.it: Quindi andrai al suo show e canterai.

translation.en: [Beauty] The album ain't even done yet.
[woman] Nobody wants you to go on The Irv Merlin Show and sing a song they've never heard of.
translation.it: Nessuno vuole che canti un pezzo sconosciuto all'Irv Merlin Show.

translation.en: [Beauty] I don't wanna go on TV singing someone else's song.
translation.it: Non voglio andare in TV a cantare un pezzo di qualcun altro.

translation.en: I wanna sing my own music.
[woman] Nobody's gonna care what you're singing.
What they care about is that you are a young, beautiful woman
translation.it: A loro importa che tu sia una giovane e bellissima donna

translation.en: with a voice of an angel.
translation.it: con la voce di un angelo.

translation.en: That song is wholesome, and Irv's audience knows that.
translation.it: È una bella canzone e il pubblico di Irv la conosce.

translation.en: You mean white people know it.
translation.it: Vuoi dire che i bianchi la conoscono.

translation.en: Well, why don't you take this?
See if you can learn something.
Take these and see what a couple of my big stars did with their opportunity.
translation.it: Guarda come alcune mie grandi star hanno sfruttato la loro opportunità.

translation.en: I have a conference call in five.
Kelly, get me Stevie on the phone.
[Beauty] Are you gonna come in with me?
How come Mommy didn't call me?
He's at Saint Michael's on the fifth floor.
translation.it: È al Saint Michael al quinto piano.

translation.en: I'm sorry I didn't come earlier to visit you. I…
translation.it: mi dispiace di non essere venuta prima. Io…

translation.en: I didn't know you were sick.
They said they have to open me up,
Not getting enough blood or something.

translation.it: È perché mangi tutto quel maiale.

translation.en: But I'm young. I can do all that.
translation.it: Ma io sono giovane. Posso farlo.

translation.en: -If I don't make it outta here-- -Don't… don't say that.
translation.it: - Se non dovessi farcela… - Non dire così.

translation.en: Let me speak my piece, okay?
I've always been an ambitious man.
translation.it: Sono sempre stato un uomo ambizioso.

translation.en: I got that from my father.

translation.it: La sua vita è stata dura.

translation.en: I think that's why I was so determined to make something of myself.
translation.it: Per questo ero così determinato a diventare qualcuno.

translation.en: I wanted my life to have meaning.
translation.it: Volevo che la mia vita avesse un senso.
mi sono reso conto… che dovevo accontentarmi di fare il capofamiglia.

translation.en: for just being the head of my house.
translation.it: che dovevo accontentarmi di fare il capofamiglia.

translation.en: I wasn't even good at that.
That's why it was so important
translation.it: Ecco perché per me era così importante

translation.en: to me that you make it.
I thought, if you went far,
translation.it: Pensavo che se tu avessi fatto strada,

translation.en: [Father] That's why it's hard for me to say this…
translation.it: Ecco perché è difficile per me dirlo…

translation.en: but I need you to give me my cut.
translation.it: ma ho bisogno che tu mi dia la mia parte.

translation.en: [Father] I'm the one negotiated that contract for you. You know what? I'm not doing this.
translation.it: - Ho negoziato quel contratto per te. - Non lo farò.

translation.en: [Father] I know you got a new apartment downtown.
translation.it: So che hai un nuovo appartamento in centro.

translation.en: I even heard you bought your little girlfriend a car.
translation.it: So che hai comprato un'auto alla tua amichetta.

translation.en: Yeah, and where'd you hear that?
You can't keep nothing from me.
Is that why you wanted to see me?
translation.it: È per questo che volevi vedermi?

translation.en: [Father] All I need is for you to pay me what you owe.
translation.it: Mi serve solo che mi paghi quanto mi devi.

translation.en: You owe me your whole life.
translation.it: Mi devi tutta la tua vita.

translation.en: [chuckles] I didn't think the business was gonna change you,
but you up in here acting all crazy, and you ain't even had a hit record yet.
translation.it: ma ecco che già fai la matta e non hai neanche un album di successo.

translation.en: I'mma have a whole bunch of 'em.
And while I'm celebrating, drinking champagne,
Those the last words you wanna say to your father?
translation.it: Sono le ultime parole che vuoi dire a tuo padre?

translation.en: Is that how you want me to remember you?
[Irv] How would you describe the young lady who's about to come out here?
translation.it: Come descriveresti la signorina che sta per uscire?

translation.en: Well, I would say she's magical.
[woman] Thank you. And I think she's strong and confident.
translation.it: Grazie. E penso che sia forte e sicura di sé.

translation.en: It's true. She has a beautiful complexion.
translation.it: È vero. È una bellissima ragazza.

translation.en: You ready? Of course I am.
translation.it: - Sei pronta? - Certo che lo sono.

translation.en: Your father would be so proud.
Jas, can you put that thing away?
translation.it: Jas, puoi mettere via quel coso?

translation.en: This is a big deal. I wanna capture the moment.
Wha-- You hear how slow they playing?
If they play like that, you'll put everybody to sleep.
I'mma go tell them to speed it up.
Ma, they the house band. I think they know what they doing.
translation.it: Mamma, sono la band del programma. Sanno quello che fanno.

translation.en: They're used to playing for little white girls. You from the church.
translation.it: Sono abituati a suonare per le bianche. Tu sei della chiesa.

translation.en: But if it wasn't for her, I wouldn't be here.
translation.it: Ma se non fosse per lei, non sarei qui.

translation.en: [neighbor] Listen, I ain't got all day now.
Yo, who the fuck is that?
It's the boy from the other apartment, the one complaining about the music.
translation.it: È il ragazzo dell'altro appartamento, che si lamenta della musica.

translation.en: Not yet, but I will be.
Yeah? What makes you so sure?
that no one can sing better than me.
translation.it: che nessuno sa cantare meglio di me.

translation.en: Can't nobody sing better than her.
Well, we just gonna have to see about that, ain't we?
Well, um, I just wanted to come back here, uh, wish you good luck, give you those.
translation.it: Beh, volevo solo augurarti buona fortuna e darti quelli.

translation.en: I just wanted him to come and hear me sing.
translation.it: Volevo che venisse a sentirmi cantare.

translation.en: 'Cause I told him I was a good singer, and he didn't believe me.
translation.it: Gli ho detto che ero una brava cantante e non mi ha creduto.

translation.en: Is that the only reason you invited him?
the only person I wanna hear applauding is you.
translation.it: sarai l'unica persona che vorrò sentire applaudire.

translation.en: I would applaud for you even if you fall flat on your face.
translation.it: Applaudirei per te anche se fallissi miseramente.

translation.en: …and she has this aura about her that's magnetic.
[Irv] Yes. I was drawn to her right away when I saw her perform the other night.
translation.it: Sì. Mi ha subito rapito quando l'ho vista esibirsi l'altra sera.

translation.en: [woman] Mm-hmm. I don't think I've ever met someone quite like her.
translation.it: Non ho mai conosciuto una come lei.

translation.en: that kind of girl that only comes along once in a lifetime.
translation.it: quel tipo di ragazza che capita solo una volta nella vita.

translation.en: it's like God was showing off a little bit when He made her.
translation.it: Dio ha dato del suo meglio quando l'ha creata.

translation.en: -[Irv] Sure. -That He breathed it on her vocal cords…
translation.it: - Certo. - Ha soffiato sulle sue corde vocali…

translation.en: smiled when He made her spirit
translation.it: ha sorriso quando ha creato il suo spirito

translation.en: and laughed when He finished that face.
translation.it: e ha riso quando ha completato quel volto.

translation.en: [woman] Yeah. I think, uh, she made… He made something truly special.
translation.it: Sì. Credo che abbia creato qualcosa di davvero speciale.

translation.en: Yeah, I… I just think that she's gonna change all of our lives.
translation.it: Sì, penso che lei cambierà tutte le nostre vite.
